import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import api from './services/api'; import './global.css'; import './App.css'; import './Sidebar.css'; import './Main.css'; function App() { const [github_username, setGithub_username] = useState(''); const [techs, setTechs] = useState(''); const [latitude, setLatitude] = useState(''); const [longitude, setLongitude] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition( (position) => { const { latitude, longitude } = position.coords; setLatitude(latitude); setLongitude(longitude); }, (err) => { console.log(err); }, { timeout: 30000, } ) }, []); async function handleAddDev(e) { e.preventDefault(); const response = await api.post('/devs', { github_username, techs, latitude, longitude, }) console.log(response.data); } return (
Cadastrar
setGithub_username(e.target.value)} />
